description: This is a good app, very straightforward, but I wish it would tell me the right answer when I get it wrong.
a simple program for memorizing hiragana and katakana from their romaji counterparts. great in tandem with a learning program, and much simpler than something like Anki. all in all, very good :>
Great little tool that's really helping me in my learning efforts. I have experienced zero problems with it.
